00027 namespace {
00028     void validate_identifier(const WorldObject& obj, boost::shared_ptr<Identifier> identifier) {
00029         if(obj.id() != identifier) {
00030             throw std::invalid_argument("Illegal identifier. Outdated? Cloned? Self-created?");
00031         }
00032     }
00033 
00034     std::string get_error_message(std::string method_name) {
00035         return method_name + "not implemented in this model.";
00036     }
00037 
00038 }
00039 
00040 template<typename T>
00041 T View::delegate_function(boost::function<T (const View*, const RobotData&)> own_robot_fun,
00042                           boost::function<T (const View*, const RobotData&)> other_robot_fun,
00043                           boost::function<T (const View*, const Obstacle&)> obstacle_fun,
00044                           boost::function<T (const View*, const WorldObject&)> marker_fun,
00045                           const Robot& caller, WorldObjectRef world_object) const {
00046     if(RobotRef ref = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<RobotIdentifier>(world_object)) {
00047         if(is_own_identifier(caller, ref)) {
00048             return own_robot_fun(this, resolve_robot_ref(ref));
00049         } else {
00050             return other_robot_fun(this, resolve_robot_ref_safe(ref));
00051         }
00052     } else if(ObstacleRef ref = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<ObstacleIdentifier>(world_object)) {
00053         return obstacle_fun(this, resolve_obstacle_ref_safe(ref));
00054     } else if(MarkerRef ref = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<MarkerIdentifier>(world_object)) {
00055         return marker_fun(this, resolve_marker_ref_safe(ref));
00056     } else {
00057         throw std::invalid_argument("Illegal type of world_object.");
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 template<typename T>
00062 T View::delegate_function(boost::function<T (const View*, const RobotData&)> own_robot_fun,
00063                           boost::function<T (const View*, const RobotData&)> other_robot_fun,
00064                           const Robot& caller, RobotRef robot) const {
00065     if(is_own_identifier(caller, robot)) {
00066         return own_robot_fun(this, resolve_robot_ref(robot));
00067     } else {
00068         return other_robot_fun(this, resolve_robot_ref_safe(robot));
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool View::is_own_identifier(const Robot& robot, boost::shared_ptr<RobotIdentifier> identifier) {
00073     return robot.id()->id() == identifier->id();
00074 }
00075 
00076 const Obstacle& View::resolve_obstacle_ref(ObstacleRef obstacle) const {
00077     return *(world_information().obstacles())[obstacle->id()];
00078 }
00079 const RobotData& View::resolve_robot_ref(RobotRef robot) const {
00080     return *(world_information().robot_data())[robot->id()];
00081 }
00082 const WorldObject& View::resolve_marker_ref(MarkerRef marker) const {
00083     return *(world_information().markers())[marker->id()];
00084 }
00085 const Box& View::resolve_box_ref(BoxRef box) const {
00086     return static_cast<const Box&>(resolve_obstacle_ref(box));
00087 }
00088 const Sphere& View::resolve_sphere_ref(SphereRef sphere) const {
00089     return static_cast<const Sphere&>(resolve_obstacle_ref(sphere));
00090 }
00091 
00092 const Obstacle& View::resolve_obstacle_ref_safe(ObstacleRef obstacle) const {
00093     const Obstacle& result = resolve_obstacle_ref(obstacle);
00094     validate_identifier(result, obstacle);
00095     return result;
00096 }
00097 const RobotData& View::resolve_robot_ref_safe(RobotRef robot) const {
00098     const RobotData& result = resolve_robot_ref(robot);
00099     validate_identifier(result, robot);
00100     return result;
00101 }
00102 const WorldObject& View::resolve_marker_ref_safe(MarkerRef marker) const {
00103     const WorldObject& result = resolve_marker_ref(marker);
00104     validate_identifier(result, marker);
00105     return result;
00106 }
00107 const Box& View::resolve_box_ref_safe(BoxRef box) const {
00108     const Box& result = resolve_box_ref(box);
00109     validate_identifier(result, box);
00110     return result;
00111 }
00112 const Sphere& View::resolve_sphere_ref_safe(SphereRef sphere) const {
00113     const Sphere& result = resolve_sphere_ref(sphere);
00114     validate_identifier(result, sphere);
00115     return result;
00116 }

00140 const Vector3d View::get_position(const Robot& caller, WorldObjectRef world_object) const {
00141     Vector3d position_global_coords;
00142     position_global_coords = delegate_function<Vector3d>(&View::get_own_position, &View::get_robot_position,
00143                                                          &View::get_obstacle_position, &View::get_marker_position,
00144                                                          caller, world_object);
00145     const RobotData& robot_data = resolve_robot_ref(caller.id());
00146     return *CoordConverter::global_to_local(position_global_coords, robot_data.position(), robot_data.coordinate_system_axis());
00147 }

00151                                                        &View::get_obstacles_marker_information, &View::get_markers_marker_information,
00152                                                        caller, world_object);
00153 }

00166         const Robot& caller, RobotRef robot) const {
